resources.string: Yeah ! You have just registered to\nwith us successfully
Notifies your customers when their turn approaches
Where do you want\nto get queued today
Nothing should happen on this page, here for test purpose
Tap \'OK\' to log out, when you log back in you\'ll be able to create a new Pincode.\n\nIf you remember your Pincode, tap \'Cancel\' to go back.
How do i know of my turn
Can i join in multiple queues

string-array.name: string_array_alcohol
string-array.item: EZQ are specially designed for clinics allowing them to reduce queue lengths and increase staff productivity and operational efficiency.

string-array.name: string_array_coffee
string-array.item: Having an efficient clinic queue management system has now become a necessity at health care institutions especially when the patients visiting the facility are either in pain or frail health, making it difficult for them to queue for long periods of time until a medical practitioner is available to treat them. Our clinic queue management system helps manage a seamless flow of patients right from an initial entry point to check out.

string-array.name: string_array_pasta
string-array.item: It is very simple to get queued, Click on the Now button in home page or click on the search button in the bottom menu, which will list all the clinics. select the clinic you want to visit and choose the doctor you want to see and get yourself queued

string-array.name: string_array_cold_drinks
string-array.item: Once you get queued, you will see the floating bar in the home page, where you will get notified of the every queue movement. You will also receive the notification of your queue. once you are the last one waiting your phone will get the vibration.

string-array.name: string_array_multiple_drinks
string-array.item: Yes, you can join in multiple queues, but any point of time you can get into maximum of three queues

string-array.name: string_array_cancel_drinks
string-array.item: Yes, any point of time you can cancel a queue. if you cancel queues more than three times in a day, the app will automatically restrict you of booking for that day.

string-array.name: string_array_honou_drinks
string-array.item: We would to like serve all customers in a fair way. However for any reason, the Doctor or the clinic want to reject the queued customers, they can cancel it any point of time.
